CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Verint Systems Inc with its subsidiaries helps brands provide Boundless Customer Engagement. The company's solutions help iconic brands close the gap created when it lacks the resources required to deliver experiences that fulfill customer expectations. The operating business segments are Customer Engagement and Cyber Intelligence. The Customer Engagement segment derives maximum revenue for the company.
